name: Quests & Creatures | Brass Version
description:
Quests & Creatures is a simple card game, driven by your imagination and single sheet of paper. This Zine will guide you and your friends on quests with unique creatures that you can create yourself!

Print the zine on a single sheet of paper. All you need is some dice, a deck of cards and a pen! Have fun!

REQUIRED MATERIALS 1) Pen and Paper 2) Dice: D20, D12 and D6   3) 52 card deck with the Jokers removed.

NOTE TO STREAMERS:

If you want to stream this game and play with chat, I suggest you check out:https://playingcards.io/. You can create a lobby for free   and share with your chat. It supports dice and cards.

Hail Adventurers! Welcome to “Quests & Creatures ZINE”! Each version of QnC is different. In this version, some one needs to take on the role of the QUEST MASTER. This special player will need to be creative and do some prep work ahead of each quest. The QM will need to design four locations, create four bosses, a final boss, write nine NPCs, four short stories and one ending. Each of these elements will be used in game. Please read all of the rules before playing! QnC is designed to be played in a multiplayer setting or you may play singleplayer mode! Creatures created in any other version are compatible with this version too! GLHF!
